titleStmt.title: A sermon of Gods omnipotencie and prouidence
titleStmt.author: Carter, Bezaleel, d. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by C. L[eege] And are to be sold [in London] by Matthevv Law, in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Foxe,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and distribution, and printer's name from STC.
